revision.comment: add missing final period (full stop) in 'From ...' line
revision.text: {{also|xát|xắt|x̱át}} ==English== ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|en|hai|}}. ===Pronunciation=== {{enPR|ᴋʜät}}, {{IPA|en|/xɑt/}} ===Noun=== {{en-noun}} # A carved pole erected as a memorial to the dead by some Native Americans of Western North America. ===References=== * Webster's Third New International Dictionary: Unabridged, 1961 Merriam-Webster. ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|en|a=atx|ATX|Axt|tax|tax-}} ---- ==Catalan== ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|ca|en|chat}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{ca-IPA}} * {{rhymes|ca|at|s=1}} ===Noun=== {{ca-noun|m}} # [[chat]] (through a computer network) ====Derived terms==== * {{l|ca|xatejar}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:IEC2}} ---- ==Paipai== ===Noun=== {{head|ppi|noun}} # [[dog]] [[Category:ppi:Dogs]] ---- ==Phalura== ===Etymology=== From {{bor|phl|ur|خط|tr=xat}}, from {{der|phl|ar|خَطّ}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|phl|/xat/}} ===Noun=== {{head|phl|noun|g=f|Perso-Arabic spelling|خط}} # letter ====Inflection==== i-decl (Obl, pl): -í ===References=== * {{R:phl:Liljegren:Vocab}} ---- ==Uzbek== ===Noun=== {{uz-noun}} # [[letter]] (written message)
